resources.string: All rights to video tutorials in the application belong to the YouTube channels "Хауди Хо","TutorOnline - lessons for schoolchildren". We dont want to mislead the user and assign the rights to their videos to ourselves. If you are a representative of the YouTube channel "TutorOnline" or "Хауди Хо" and you are not satisfied that your video lessons are in this application, then write about it by email faceswiper@gmail.com
